name: Light The Fire
description:
Light The Fire is a submission to the GMTK Jam of 2021 (theme was Joined Together).
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Objective
Light all fireflies and be unified

Controls
Your beak will point you in the direction you will move after detaching.
Detaching from a fast firefly will make you move fast and vice versa.
Patience is a virtue.

W to detach from a firefly
You cannot reattach to the same firefly until you've attached to a new one.

R to restart the current level

ESC to quit
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits
Audio was made using BeepBox
Game made in Unreal Engine 4 (4.25.4)
